message.raw:
Bug fix: Segmentations read from files that specified strand information
  were created with strand information included. This caused problems
  in segtools-flatten when flattening between Segmentations with strand
  information and those without. Segmentations no longer contain any
  strand information, even if the underlying file specifies it.
message.html:
Bug fix: Segmentations read from files that specified strand information
were created with strand information included. This caused problems
in segtools-flatten when flattening between Segmentations with strand
information and those without. Segmentations no longer contain any
strand information, even if the underlying file specifies it.

message:
Bug fix: Segmentations read from files that specified strand information
  were created with strand information included. This caused problems
  in segtools-flatten when flattening between Segmentations with strand
  information and those without. Segmentations no longer contain any
  strand information, even if the underlying file specifies it.
